basics.name: Rutger Meekers
basics.label: Internet Consultant
basics.summary: 15 years of experience in several agile project management and consultancy roles. Has been active in a wide variety of industries.  Goes extremely far to reach the upper level of customer satisfaction. Only satisfied once his customers are. Promises are made to be kept. His relationships are based on transparency and honesty.  Passionate about the fast-moving world of ICT and Internet. Eager to learn and open for improvements. Quickly picks out any flaws in his environment.  Takes the lead in difficult situations while keeping his head cool.

work.summary: Internet consultant for the Procurios Webplatform
Product Owner for the Etex Global Web Platform which is built on Sitecore and ADAM technologies and has interfaces to many backend systems.
highlights: Working with several external development teams

work.summary: My team and I were responsible for the WMS software (built on MS Dynamics Nav) to run a complete logistic unit within the BU Industry.
My own company which I've founded after I quit school at the age of 19. eSOL was an ICT service provider for the SMB market.
highlights: Project Management (offshore outsourcing to Eastern Europe)
Migrating the school to the cloud (Office 365)

volunteer.summary: LAN-Party organisation of which I was the co-founder. We organised eight editions with 150 - 250 attendants.  This was one of my hobby projects during my schooltime and my first experience with project management and event organisation

references.name: Jos Jelier
references.reference: Rutger is a diligent, hard and honest worker with a lot of experience with and knowledge of web (applications) in general, content management, usability, e-commerce and web analytics. He understands software and its (best) use cases quickly. He has a talent for helping clients, to implement software with a maximum fit with the clients need. At Procurios he has always been a valued employee.

references.name: Peter Jensen
references.reference: Working with Rutger on a rather non-standard project for a non-profit with some very specific requirements. Always pragmatic in his approach and will provide positive input. Not afraid to provide very valid challenges if needed.

references.name: Eline Walda
references.reference: My contact with Rutger was brief but highly effective. Rutger has helped me set up Google Tag Manager and has done so in such a manner that my goals are fully met. Moreover, a workaround had to be found for a technical issue, and he not only managed to do this, he exceeded my expectations. I am very happy with the results and I highly recommend Rutger.

references.name: Patrick Van Bergen
references.reference: I have come to know Rutger as a friendly guy with a strong eye for detail and quality. He knows what he wants and gets it done.   He followed developments in the field of SEO closely and gave his customers advise. He made himself into an expert in Google Analytics and Google Tag manager, and used this knowledge to set up many implementations for customers.

references.name: Rajiv Karmacharya
references.reference: Rutger and I worked together for couple of projects at IToffshore and Procurios. We had wonderful time back then. I find him knowledgeable and very result oriented person. From sales and account management prospective, he is the best person a client can get. He considers requirement of client as his own and ensure they get the what they really need.

references.name: Jonas Lauwerysen
references.reference: A very pleasant colleague and a competent boss. As a supervisor Rutger is aware of what his employees are working on and is very eager to step in when help is needed. He has an objective approach to every problem and looks for the most effective way to solve it.  He often offers new perspectives on possible solutions and listens to everyone´s suggestion.  Rutger has a strong work ethic and is the first to arrive and the last to leave the office. He doesn´t shy away from crisis situations or difficult customers.  He is calm and never panics or loses focus.  It´s been a real pleasure working with him.

references.name: Jurgen De Cock
references.reference: Rutger is a no nonsense hands-on business/IT-analyst and who manages to quickly identify operational needs and translate them clearly into IT requirements. Rutger also has a keen interest in new technologies.  As project manager, even though being customer-oriented, he will look for the fine balance between nice-to-have and need-to-have.

references.name: François Deforche
references.reference: I experienced Rutger as a hands-on professional always looking for the most logical solution and not afraid to innovate. Whilst being a team-player he always kept track of the goals of his projects.
